price: Òun ni Ẹni tí Ó fi àwọn ìràwọ̀ ṣe (ìmọ́lẹ̀) fún yín kí ẹ lè fi ríran nínú òkùnkùn ilẹ̀ àti ibúdò. A kúkú ti ṣàlàyé àwọn āyah fún àwọn ènìyàn tó nímọ̀.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلنُّجُومَ لِتَهۡتَدُواْ بِهَا فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-nujūma litahtadū bihā fī ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
